description:
Beware the Batman - Season 1 - Episode 12 (DVDRip - 480p)
---------------------------------------------------------

This take on the classic comic book franchise mixes familiar characters with new
villains not previously seen in animated form. As usual, Batman tries to rid Gotham
City of evil, but he's not doing it alone. Assisting the Caped Crusader are retired
MI-6 operative Alfred Pennyworth, who also serves as the superhero's butler, and
lethal swordswoman Tatsu "Katana" Yamashiro. Among the villains who lead Gotham
City's criminal underworld that Batman and his crew battle are Anarky, Professor
Pyg, Mister Toad and Magpie.

Produced by DC Entertainment, Warner Bros. Animation and Cartoon Network.
